description: In this event the participants have to make a sketch or painting with the help of black color only. There will be no use of any other color. Five topics would be provided to the participants 10 days before the event. From those five topics, judges will give two topics to each participant and participant have to make poster on any one topic.
rules: All tools and sheets will be provided to the participant.
The time period is 1 hour to complete the sketch.
There is auction for top 10 sketches.
Each participant is only allowed to make one sketch.
Winning_prize: To be announced at the time of event. Event prize money will be auction based.
Additional_remark: Event auction will be held on 6th March at 4:30pm in central foyer
